q: , including the former BBC director-general Greg Dyke , have expressed fears that the verdict will stop broadcasting executives from doing their jobs properly. However, speaking on BBC One's Question Time, Mr Michael Gove said: Sometimes it's good that things are new and fresh, like technology or fashion or music. Sometimes you want things to be old, like cheese, wine or the presenter of Question Time. I hope that everyone at the BBC gets the message. I would rather see Selina Scott and Joanna Lumley on my TV screens than Holly Willoughby and Fearne Cotton . Selina Scott , now 59, settled an age discrimination case against Channel 5 two years ago for a reported Â£ 250,000. Holly Willoughby , 29, presents ITV's Dancing on Ice with Phillip Schofield . We are continuing the search and will find more, Zahi Hawass told Reuters. You http://wn.com/Allen_Iverson_55_pts_Playoff_Career_High_vs_NO_Hornets_2003 Philadelphia 98, New Orleans 90 Allen Iverson 's 55 Gives Sixers Game 1 In the illustious history of the Philadelphia 76ers, nobody-- not Wilt, not Julius Erving , not Moses-- had an individual performance like Allen Iverson 's against the New Orleans Hornets. Allen Iverson scored a team playoff-record 55 points as the 76ers defeated the Hornets, 98-90, in Game One of their Eastern Conference first-round series. "He was on fire, Hornets coach Paul Silas said of Allen Iverson , who fell eight points shy of Michael Jordan 's NBA playoff record set exactly 17 years ago in a double-overtime loss at Boston.
